short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of scrolling back to the top of the page? Fear not, we have a scrolling solution for you!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EZScroll places a button in the bottom-right corner of any website you visit. When clicked, you will be brought to the top of the page, saving you from wasting time scrolling all over the place!

If you like EZScroll and wish to donate and support future development, please visit our website by clicking the link to the right.
